channel.title: English speeches have to get some ideas to write on my topic
channel.description:
OK I have to present a speech for English and it has to be on "How to..." It can be anything as long as it's not offensive/inapropriate
So for my speech I chose "How to cause trouble"
So I need some ideas/ways to cause trouble and getting away with it I mean everyone knows how to cause trouble so I won't get such a good mark if I say general things like "put gum under desk" I want to be creative and give awesome ideas that people will want to try and stuff
So if you have a good idea please share it with me all ideas are appreciated :)

item.title: English speeches have to get some ideas to write on my topic
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft2 Microsoft®
item.description:
@Microsoft2 wrote:

You can do it on anything lol…

See some people are doing it on “how to cheat in exams” etc and stuff like that and the teacher approves it.

Read full topic

item.title: English speeches have to get some ideas to write on my topic
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

How about you focus your speech on something productive rather than something destructive?

It could be on sports, hobbies, anything.

Read full topic
